page.title: 19VISIT OF MAYOR OF HEREFORD
page.content: In law you have to be 21 years old to be Mayor though usually mayors are a lot older . You have to be elected councillor first.Councilor Strouckan is responsible for everyone in the city and for seeing that the city is kept clean and things work properly .He is so often asked to open new buil dings or name things like the railway engine Evening Star.Sometimes he is given presents to remind him of his year as mayor, for example he was given a painting of the 'Evening Star'.The chain the Mayor wears is gold and weighs 2lbs.It is quite historic and some of the medallions have been presented by different groups.One was presented by the S.A.S. The mayoress wears a much lighter chain.
